personaldata.name: Ralf Westphal
personaldata.position: Clean Code Development Trainer, Consultant, Author, Speaker
personaldata.shortbio: Ralf Westphal is a trainer, consultant, and co-founder of a large German Clean Code initiative. His focus is on sustainable software development and making teams fit for a VUCA world. Since 1997 Ralf also has written extensively in blogs, magazines, and books. In addition he's a speaker at developer conferences in Germany, Europe and abroad.
